item.title: Brexit: European Union endorses divorce deal with United Kingdom - ABC News
item.description:
Brexit: European Union endorses divorce deal with United Kingdom  ABC News

It takes leaders a matter of minutes at a summit in Brussels to endorse a withdrawal agreement that settles Britain's divorce bill, protects the rights of UK and EU ...

item.title: Rights that protect against socioeconomic disadvantage are long overdue – the UK is already paying the price - The Conversation - UK
item.description:
Rights that protect against socioeconomic disadvantage are long overdue – the UK is already paying the price  The Conversation - UK

In a divided, alienated, austerity, backward-looking Britain, the time has come to make good on social rights.

item.title: Brexit mess could spell the end for a no longer 'United' Kingdom - ABC News
item.description:
Brexit mess could spell the end for a no longer 'United' Kingdom  ABC News

Behind the UK government's rhetoric of global Britain, there is no such thing as the British people in a political sense any more, writes Ben Welling.
